title: High Malaria Incidence
description: In 2023, Benin recorded one of the highest malaria incidences globally, with 363.4 cases per 1,000 population at risk.

title: Low Diabetes Prevalence
description: As of 2021, Benin had one of the lowest diabetes prevalence rates in the world, affecting only 1.1% of the population aged 20 to 79.

title: Limited Access to Sanitation
description: In 2022, only 2.7% of Benin's population had access to safely managed sanitation services, one of the lowest rates globally.
